import { useState,useEffect } from "react" import Banner from "../../components/Banner" import data from "../../data.json" const staffs = data.staffs; export default function CoachingStaff () { const [isCoachShow,setIsCoachShow] = useState(true); const [isPopup,setIsPopup] = useState (false); const [isActiveInPopup,setIsActiveInPopup] = useState (true); useEffect(() => { if(isPopup){ document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden'; }else{ document.body.style.overflow ='auto'; } return () => { document.body.style.overflow = 'auto'; }; },[isPopup]); return ( <>
